AdditionalNotes.value: If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts are greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L: Give as ordered. If ANC is less than 1.5 OR Plts are less than 100 x 109/L: Delay 1 week.

If ANC is greater than 1 AND Plts are greater than 100 x 109/L: Give as ordered. If ANC is less than 0.5 OR Plts are less than or equal to 75 x 109/L: Delay 1 week.
